title: Inquiry-Based Simulation Education to Improve Online News Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and news consumption experience
context.additional_context: A program fostering critical thinking by analyzing real news cases in a virtual environment.

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the credibility of online news sources with 85% accuracy
Learners distinguish fake news from factual news with over 80% accuracy through evidence-based analysis
Learners apply analytical processing procedures over intuitive judgments in news consumption over 70% of the time
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
